Hero.title: [ar] We build modern web & app solutions for businesses that want to grow digitally.
Hero.subtitle: [ar] Craftcodex helps startups, small businesses, and individuals take their ideas from sketch to finished product – websites, apps, and custom systems.

ValueProposition.title: [ar] Why Choose Craftcodex?
ValueProposition.card1_description: [ar] From idea, design, and backend to hosting & support.
ValueProposition.card2_description: [ar] React, Next.js, Java, Spring, Flutter, etc.
ValueProposition.card3_description: [ar] You talk directly to the developers, no middlemen.

Services.title: [ar] What we help you with
Services.service1_description: [ar] Corporate sites, booking systems, dashboards, e-commerce.
Services.service2_description: [ar] Flutter / React Native, integrated with existing systems.

Process.title: [ar] How it works
Process.step1_description: [ar] We listen to your idea and needs.
Process.step2_description: [ar] We develop a solution, timeline, and price.
Process.step3_description: [ar] We build, and you see partial results.
Process.step4_description: [ar] We help deploy and provide aftercare.

Portfolio.title: [ar] Projects we are proud of
Portfolio.project1_title: [ar] Booking portal for a service company
Portfolio.project1_description: [ar] Web app for booking, customer management, and admin panel.
Portfolio.project2_description: [ar] Dashboard with real-time data, graphs, and role-based login.
Portfolio.project3_description: [ar] Mobile app for news, push notifications, member profiles, and login.

Cta.title: [ar] Ready to take the next step with your idea?
Cta.subtitle: [ar] Briefly tell us what you want to build, and we'll quickly get back to you with a proposal.

About.title: [ar] About Craftcodex
About.intro: [ar] We are two developers who believe in simplicity, quality, and honesty in every line of code. Craftcodex was born out of a desire to build software that makes a difference — not just technically impressive, but genuinely solves problems.
About.vision_description: [ar] We want to be a partner that makes technology accessible, understandable, and useful. For us, development is not about stacking buzzwords, but about building solutions that last, are secure, and can grow with you.
About.process_description: [ar] At Craftcodex, we combine business understanding with technical expertise. We believe in close dialogue, clarity, and responsibility. You talk directly to us who build your solution — no middlemen, no surprises.

ServicesPage.title: [ar] Our Services
ServicesPage.service1_description: [ar] We build modern, responsive websites and web apps that work just as well on mobile as on desktop. Everything from informational sites and landing pages to booking systems, portals, and dashboards.
ServicesPage.service2_description: [ar] We develop mobile apps with React Native or Flutter, adapted for both iOS and Android. We can connect the app to existing systems, payment solutions, or APIs.
ServicesPage.service3_description: [ar] When standard solutions are not enough, we build systems that are adapted to your processes. This can be internal tools, dashboards, booking flows, e-commerce, or integrations between different systems.
ServicesPage.service4_description: [ar] We can take care of the operating environment, monitoring, updates, and troubleshooting. With Docker and modern cloud solutions, we ensure that your app or website is fast, secure, and accessible.
ServicesPage.service5_description: [ar] Do you already have a system or a website that needs to be updated, optimized, or further developed? We can step in as a development partner, do a code review, or take responsibility for further development.

ContactPage.title: [ar] Let's Build Something Great Together
ContactPage.subtitle: [ar] Tell us about your project, and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
ContactPage.message_placeholder: [ar] Describe your goals, timeline, and any specific requirements.
